title: Short-Term Course Using WBVO Videos for Foundational Accounting Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and experience with basic computer/smartphone usage
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, targeting general citizens interested in accounting but lacking systematic learning experience. Utilizes WBVO videos as supplementary materials with real-time sessions as the core

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of double-entry bookkeeping through WBVO videos and accurately prepare five basic journal entries.
Learners can identify at least three components of financial statements (income statement, balance sheet) using visualization techniques from WBVO videos in online real-time classes.
Learners can explain the budgeting process step-by-step through case analysis based on WBVO videos in formative assessments.

resources: Smartphone-compatible WBVO (White Balance Verification Object) creation tool
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
